text: Patella lugubris is a species of sea snail, a true limpet, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Patellidae, one of the families of true limpets. ==Description== ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Atlantic Ocean off Cape Verde. ==References== * Gmelin, J.F. (1791) Vermes. In Gmelin J.F. (Ed.) Caroli a Linnaei Systema Naturae per Regna Tria Naturae, Editio Decima Tertia, Aucta Reformata. Tome 1, Pars 6 (Vermes). G.E. Beer, Lipsiae [Leipzig], pp. 3021–3910 Category:Patellidae Category:Gastropods of Cape Verde Category:Gastropods described in 1791
title: Patella lugubris
